title: Tobacco firms have failed to act on radioactivity in cigarettes. Here's why. - Cancer Research UK - Cancer News
author: Oliver Childs
description: It's a plot worthy of Hollywood - a fatal radioactive poison, secret documents, suppressed information, and drugs. But this isn't fiction. This is the story of the tobacco industry's knowledge, policy and inaction around radioactive material in cigarette smoke. And how it took a painstaking search through thousands of court-ordered documents to uncover exactly why [...]
